mapper.sql: id, link_id, type, order_num, title, top
mapper.select: select a.id as linkId, a.title, 0 as type from article a union all select b.id as linkId, b.title, 2 as type from book_note b
SELECT a.id AS id, a.id AS linkId, 0 AS type, a.id AS orderNum, a.title AS title, a.top AS top FROM article a WHERE a.recommend = 1 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5

select * from ( select a.id as linkId,a.title,0 as type,a.read_num from article a union all select bn.id as linkId ,bn.title,2 as type,bn.read_num from book_note bn ) t order by t.read_num desc limit 5
